title: Leveling Up: My Degree, My Professionalism & Mixing It All Up!
content: I'm on a journey to complete my computer sciences degree while managing my job at Deloitte, where I'm involved in developing and implementing ServiceNow solutions for our clients. I'm determined to learn and excel in both areas. My coursework challenges me with complex topics, and I apply what I learn at work, making each project an opportunity to grow. My passion for web development keeps me engaged, and I enjoy writing code to improve my skills. It's a dynamic balancing act, but I'm working towards a future where all these pursuits harmonize and help me achieve my dreams.
